content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li

content: Thank you for considering me as a potential tenant, Mister Heine. I would like to negotiate the rental price of the apartment to ensure that we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. May I ask what price you have in mind for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Baihu Li

content: I want to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. Therefore, I am willing to negotiate the rental price with you. Can you please tell me what you are willing to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your interest in renting out your apartment, Mister Heine. While I am looking for the lowest price possible, I am also willing to negotiate the rental price with you. May I kindly ask what price you are looking to charge for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Baihu Li

content:
I am willing to negotiate the rental price, but I want to make sure that it is fair. Please let me know what you are willing to pay.

Also, please note that the apartment is in a prime location and has a view of the city. This can be factored into the rental price.

I would like to rent out the apartment for the highest possible price, but only if it is fair. Can you please let me know what you are willing to pay?

I will keep in mind that the apartment is in a prime location and has a view of the city, which can be factored into the rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for clarifying that you are looking for a fair rental price, Mister Heine. I understand that the apartment's prime location and city view can be factored into the rental price. Could you please provide me with a range of prices that you are considering for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Baihu Li
